required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Intra-arterial Neuroprotective Strategy for Ischemic STroke Patients With No Reperfusion Therapy (INSIST-NRT)
clinical_study.official_title: Intra-arterial Neuroprotective Strategy for Ischemic STroke Patients With No Reperfusion Therapy (INSIST-NRT): One Single Center, Safety and Feasibility Study
clinical_study.source: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

brief_summary.textblock: To explore the safety and feasibility of intra-arterial neuroprotective strategy in acute ischemic stroke patients who missed recanalization operation.

primary_outcome.description: server adverse events including femoral artery dissection, local thrombosis, seudoaneurysm, arteriovenousfistula, etc.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 1
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 2
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 2

secondary_outcome.measure: Decrease in national institutes of health stroke scale (NIHSS)
secondary_outcome.description: Decrease in NIHSS scoring at 48 hours after the treatment
sICH was defined as 4 or more increase in NIHSS caused by hemorrhage

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of intraparenchymal hemorrhage (PH1 and PH2)
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of intraparenchymal hemorrhage (PH1 and PH2) within 48 hours after the treatment
Cerebral edema was determined by cerebral volume or midline shift

secondary_outcome.measure: All causes of death within 48 hours after the treatment
secondary_outcome.description: All causes of death within 48 hours after the treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Differences in serum factors levels in different artery region
secondary_outcome.description: Differences in serum factors levels in different Bessel region before recanalization

arm_group.description: Intra-arterial administration of 3-n-butylphthalide for 24 hours via microcatheter at 17.36 ug/min.

intervention.description: Intra-arterial administration of 3-n-butylphthalide for 24 hours via microcatheter at 17.36 ug/min.

facility.name: Department of Neurology, General Hospital of Northern Theater Command

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region
